name: Orchid High School Occult Club!
description:
"I've got a client list as long as the day is long-I mean, I've got clients who-
Dang it. I check the lines in my notebook. It sounded so cool when I wrote it down last night."

Aisling Rock is not your typical detective. A student at the prestigious Orchid High, her world is turned upside down when she is asked to investigate a disappearance connected to the mysterious, and possibly dangerous, Occult Club. 

*

This game was made for NaNoRenO 2022 and unfortunately we didn't get to finish. We may have more updates coming soon, so keep your eyes peeled!
